title: Club owner cant see club
body:
I have reported this before as a bug probably a year ago now but my profile is still bugged and I cannot view my club i made a long time ago. My brother and friends say that I am still the owner of it and yet I am able to create a new one for some reason even though clearly I still own my old club.

can someone at riot please fix my account please the Clubs name is "Never Lucky Syndrome" thanks

replies.body: Hey there!  I booped your club, so everything should look okay now!

Hello, I am having the same issue as Arkaiden, I am also on NA, my club is MTRL*

Any chance you could help out?
Thank you very much! everything is fixed :)
Please fix my brothers account for him.
